extendedInfo.description: A legend is remembered always like current. 1992 with passion and fight, reminisce that time.You can treasure uniforms and back numbers of athletes like legend. That Memory will infuse new life into your exhausted mind.***Main Features:- Exclusive Widgets: Clock, Memo Calendar, Contact, Settings and Search Bar- Gestures: Pinch, Double Touch, Slide, Long-Touch- Smart Folder: Ability to add folders on ALL apps and the âHomeâ screen, flexible sizing- Dock Bar: Access up to 20 of your favorite apps instantly, includes an âEmotionalâ Filter Effect, Screen settings, and opacity adjustments.- Multi-Wallpaper: Automatically switch between 3-24 different wallpapers when the display is turned on/off- Deep Customization: âPoint Colorsâ are completely adjustable and modify the look and feel of Widgets, Menu, Guides, or Icons.- Live Background: Brings your background into the 21st century â beautiful dynamic backgrounds- Wide-Ranging Theme Support: Supports existing SSKIN and GO launching themes***Main Points:- High Quality: Optimized for Ice Cream Sandwich / Jellybean (Android ICS/JB 4.0.2 onwards)- Light & Easy: Options instantly selectable through a light and easy launcher interface- Stylish: Stylish UI with beautiful backgrounds, icons, and custom color schemes from professional designers- Smart: Themes are optimized automatically for ICS and existing launchers such as SSKIN and GO are completely supported - Fun: Offers fun, interactive themes with live, beautiful backgrounds and widgets***ATTENTION- Available from Android OS version 4.0.2 and above- Requires 10 MB space to save theme resources- To enhance usability, installed theme doesnât appear- Not available for Tab Devices (Extra-Large Screen)- Badges: Display missed call, unread messages (ATOM only supports default apps on your Android device, does not support device-specific functions)- Due to resolution issues, service is currently stopped on âOptimus Viewâ*** Customer SupportPlease leave reviews or comments.
